data.text: @Coleman837 @castrocasam @jordanbpeterson It’s idiotic. YOU’RE the one who’s been brainwashed. -Not the rest of society allowing regular medicine to be practiced in this country. If you go to prison, your cellie would beat your ass for being a pussy, endangering him with your twacked out paranoia. You’d go AWOL in a war.

@Coleman837 @castrocasam @jordanbpeterson It’s a fucking pandemic.  If that’s your logic, then why even let your kids take the regular schedule of immunizations? It’s the same as letting Mumps, Measles, Rubella, Yellow Fever and everything else to return and spread. Your kid gets bit by a rabid dog. No shot. They die.

@Radio1943 @ceegarciabee @inJRwetrust0419 @joannedinn @jordanbpeterson The catch with COVID is that the long-term effects can appear despite the acute phase being quite mild.
Good friend of mine got it early in the omicron wave. Described it as a bad cold. "Better" in 3 or 4 days. Still can't play hockey. Can't run. Fairly winded climbing stairs.

@castrocasam @TrujilloKurt @jordanbpeterson Thats not ironic. I’m arguing that you are getting your security from forcing others who have different values and culture than you how to behave. Follow whatever medical opinions you want and take responsibility for yourself. I will do the same.

@ceegarciabee @inJRwetrust0419 @Lindseyottawa @joannedinn @jordanbpeterson Well thank you for the information. I suppose I know what to look for if my children ever develope an infection from a disease that requires hospitalization. Although, I feel like that is not limited to covid.

@Coleman837 @TrujilloKurt @jordanbpeterson again - this seems Ironic considering your initial tweet bud.. "They’re acting like a bunch of nerds who are too afraid to speak out and stand up for what they believe and peoples rights." - maybe you ought to stop worrying about others also...
@castrocasam @TrujilloKurt @jordanbpeterson How about stop worrying about what other people think and go and live your life. I will be free from your Covid fear and happier for it.

@Coleman837 @TrujilloKurt @jordanbpeterson You understand that picking people like Peterson directly profit from spreading potentially bad information because people like you will then go to their streams, videos, websites and give them add revenue…? It’s profitable to peddle information regardless of truth.
